contact_with_us.contact_subtitle: We are ready to answer any questions about real estate

home_first.home_first_title:
Real estate
selection
with full support
in your language
home_first.home_first_description:
Our agency specializes in premium objects and presents them to you in Russian. Selection of real estate
throughout France with a focus on the most privileged and picturesque areas of the French Mediterranean - Nice, Cannes or the Cote d'Azur without unnecessary time and extra charges.

home_second.home_second_subtitle: This is taking care of you and your property
home_second.home_second_description: We are ready to pleasantly surprise you with a special approach and, of course, a reverent attitude towards each client. We speak your language, so you can easily and simply make a deal remotely or visit our office. Tell us about your preferences and we will select a worthwhile option in the heart of the French Riviera without intermediaries.

slider.slider_title_full: Apartment with sea view on the Promenade des Anglais
slider.slider_description: Fully renovated 3-room apartment on the 5th floor in a small residence on the famous Promenade des Anglais.

home_fourth.home_fourth_description: The conclusion of a real estate transaction is possible in any format convenient to you. Visit our office and get to know our team in person. If you prefer online communication, our team will be happy to organize such interaction. You have only one thing left to decide: a remote transaction or personal presence.

home_fifth.home_fifth_description_left: If you own real estate in France, we will become intermediaries between you and the cases that you would prefer not to deal with. This is possible not only at the stage of concluding a transaction, but also during further management of the property. We will contact the departments, tax authorities and telephone operators, we will pay the bills or represent you at the annual meeting of the owners. We will take care of all matters related to your personal presence and introduce you wherever required. Azur Life has all the licenses necessary for this.
home_fifth.home_fifth_description_right: For those who value their time, we offer concierge services: this is a real concern for our customers. We organize events, rent private planes, yachts and cars. We will also book hotels, restaurants, order a transfer or call a taxi, find staff for the selected property and do it so as not to distract you from your business.

home_sixth.home_description_left: Your peace of mind is a priority for us: we have all the necessary licenses, insurance and financial guarantees required by French law to carry out real estate transactions.
home_sixth.home_description_center: Azur Life is a member of the National Federation of Real Estate Agents (FNAIM) and has access to an extensive database of real estate properties throughout France from owners. No commissions and overpayments, only direct interaction with Azur Life.
home_sixth.home_description_right: Concierge service, rental, expert assessment and property management or the purchase and sale of your apartments - we will do everything to make owning real estate only a pleasure.

home_eighth.home_eighth_request_title: Get information about new objects first

about_first.about_first_description: Opening new horizons of France for you. We will select a property based on the voiced requests, provide management of your apartments or provide a concierge service, and you can only do one thing: enjoy life.

about_fourth.about_fourth_description: Your Life is a dynamically developing agency that has been upholding the values of confidentiality, loyalty, high professionalism and individual approach since 2017. We have all the necessary licenses, insurance and financial guarantees required by French law in order to conduct your real estate transaction as efficiently and comfortably as possible.

objects_first.objects_first_description: Azur Life specializes in premium properties throughout France. We will serve as a mediator for any transaction with luxury real estate: you can buy, sell or rent apartments efficiently and quickly.

sell_first.sell_first_description: It is easy to purchase real estate in France: contact the managers of Azur Life to settle all administrative formalities related to the acquisition of property.

filter.filter_title_full: Apartment with sea view on the Promenade des Anglais
filter.filter_description_full: Fully renovated 3-room apartment on the 5th floor in a small residence on the famous Promenade des Anglais.

rent_first.rent_first_description:
It is easy to rent a property for a season or choose something for a long-term period.
Azur Life provides the option of full support of the lease transaction. We will choose premium villas and apartments according to your request without commission and additional charges.

blog_first.blog_text_first: OuSituated on the slopes of Cap Ferrat in a private setting with breathtaking sea views and yet just a short walk from the village and harbour of Saint Jean Cap Ferrat, this villa is one of the most desirable properties on this stretch of the French Riviera.Modern and open plan, the villa offers the perfect setting for both relaxing and entertaining. Expansive glass windows and sliding doors flood rooms with natural light whilst providing guests with outstanding sea views. With 1000m2 of living space spread across four floors and served by a glass elevator, there is plenty of room to host events or find a quiet corner in which to relax. Villa has five luxurious bedrooms with private bathrooms and able to comfortably accommodate up to 10 guests.
blog_first.blog_text_second: All of the rooms have lounge areas, beautiful ensuite bathrooms and Bang & Olufsen entertainment systems. A seventh double bedroom is available for staff.

join_first.join_first_description: Become a member of Azur Life. Fill out the form below so that we can get to know you better.

buy-sell-rent_first.buy-sell-rent_first_description: Azur Life will expand the horizons of real estate transactions in France. It doesn't matter what you need today: the sale of apartments or the purchase of new real estate, together with Azur Life this process will be fast.

buy-sell-rent_third.buy-sell-rent_third_description_buy: Exclusive selection of apartments in France. In order to choose the best property, you only need to do one thing - trust us. Contact us to select the preferred option from the list of locations and spaces.
buy-sell-rent_third.buy-sell-rent_third_description_sell: It is easy to sell real estate in France: contact the managers of Azur Life to settle all administrative formalities related to your property.
buy-sell-rent_third.buy-sell-rent_third_description_rent: Azur Life provides the option of full support of the lease transaction. We will choose premium villas and apartments according to your request without commission and additional charges. All you have to do is voice your preferences.

buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_buy_title: Advantages of buying with Azur Life
buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_rent_title: Advantages of renting with Azur Life
buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_sell_title: Advantages of selling real estate with us
buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_buy_first_descri: Buying real estate in your language. Azur Life's experienced employees accompany clients throughout the entire transaction process with ease of interaction.
buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_buy_second_descr: Buying a property will be a pleasant pastime for you. We will organize your stay in France during the purchase of an object so that it is easy, pleasant and convenient for you.
buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_buy_third_descri: The purchase of real estate takes place without additional margins and commissions, and the selection of objects is carried out from the premium real estate database to choose the option that will be best suitable for you
buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_rent_first_descr: Real estate rentals are easy and consistent. To provide high-quality real estate services, we have all the necessary licenses, insurance and financial guarantees required by French law.
buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_rent_second_desc: Azur Life is a member of the National Federation of Real Estate Agents (FNAIM) and has access to an extensive database of real estate properties throughout France. This makes it possible to choose unique objects for the period that will be convenient for you.
buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_rent_third_descr: We organize concierge service and management of rented real estate so that living in the selected object brings only pleasure.
buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_sell_first_descr: Thanks to many years of work in this field and accumulated experience, we are able to quickly and easily carry out a real estate sale transaction: we will find a buyer, determine the value of the property that is favorable for you and arrange all the documents.
buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_sell_second_desc: 360° customer service. We take responsibility for conducting the transaction, as well as draw up all the documents required by French law for the sale of real estate. We will also arrange your stay in France during the conclusion of the transaction.
buy-sell-rent_advantage.buy-sell-rent_advantage_sell_third_descr: Sale of real estate in your language. Azur Life's experienced employees accompany clients throughout the entire transaction process with ease in interacting with you.

expertise_first.expertise_first_description: Expert assessment of housing may be needed when taking out a loan from a bank or when inheriting housing. In order to protect you from interaction with government agencies, we ourselves conduct an expert assessment of the property and determine the market value of the property.

feedback.feedback_title_concierge: Leave a request for concierge service

property_first.property_first_title: Transfer real estate in France to our management
property_first.property_first_description: In order for you not to be distracted from what is really important, we create special conditions of comfort and care for you. We will provide cleaning of your property, pay the bills, prepare an apartment or villa for your arrival or rent it out if necessary. We have all the necessary licenses and documents to do this efficiently and quickly.

experience_block.experience_block_subtitle_concierge: Concierge service with a special approach

property_concierge.property_concierge_concierge_title: Concierge service with a special approach
property_concierge.property_concierge_property_description: We will pay the bills or prepare the apartment for arrival.  Let's rent out your property or order space cleaning: choose what you need.
property_concierge.property_concierge_concierge_description: Our customers are satisfied with our special approach and attention to detail and requests. Everything that is required for the perfect travel of Azur life customers will be organized for you.
